title: Consequences

embed.description: that your actions have consequences? You frickin' fricks... Thanks for 500k guys. And 750k. And 10k likes. Original here by SammyClassicSonicFan: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Ef3rm9PXdCI#t=169 From Sammy's channel description: "I was born in 1998, diagnosed with high-functioning autism at age 3, I am a Christian, and I am destine to be a successful video game creator."

body:
So I'm posting this to talk about reporting and consequences (hence the title). Lately I've been going into so many games Ranked and norms in which there were the usual: Feeders, Trolls, "Bullies",etc   who in my opinion don't get much of a consequence. Don't get me wrong I don't mind them too much however the toll as i'm seeing is rising a lot since the first time i've played. In my opinion I don't think they get much different after each report thats filed against them. So, what's your thought?

All these flavours and you choose to be SALTY - Bill Clinton

replies.body: How do expect people to take you seriously with this gem playing?
